env._comment: ⚠️ SECURITY: All secrets should be set via EAS Secrets or environment variables. Never commit secrets to version control.
env._comment2: Use: eas secret:create --scope project --name EXPO_PUBLIC_VIBECODE_OPENAI_API_KEY --value YOUR_KEY
env._comment3: See eas.json.example for template. Remove STRIPE_SECRET_KEY - it should NEVER be in client code!
